title: Water Avenue Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local coffee roaster offering a small menu that is mostly vegetarian (except for a turkey sandwich) with some being vegan or vegan-optional, such as avocado toast, oatmeal, bagels, pastries, salads, and sandwiches. From-scratch kitchen emphasizing fresh and local products and business donates to local causes. Kitchen closes 3pm.
